Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
services.AppointmentService
public class AppointmentService extends Object
AppointmentService handles business logic related to appointments, including scheduling, rescheduling, cancellation, and checking the availability of doctors for appointments.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Constructs an AppointmentService with the specified repositories and doctor schedule service.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentService

      public AppointmentService(AppointmentRepository appointmentRepository, UserRepository userRepository, DoctorScheduleService doctorScheduleService)
      Constructs an AppointmentService with the specified repositories and doctor schedule service.
      Parameters:
      appointmentRepository - the repository for managing appointments
      userRepository - the repository for managing users
      doctorScheduleService - the service for managing doctor schedules

  • Method Details

    • scheduleAppointment

      public List<Appointment> scheduleAppointment(String patientId, String doctorId, String date, String time)
      Schedules a new appointment if the slot is available.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The patient's ID.
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      time - The time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      A list containing the scheduled appointment if successful, or an empty list if unsuccessful.

    • isSlotAvailable

      public boolean isSlotAvailable(String doctorId, String date, String time)
      Checks if a time slot is available for a doctor on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      date - The date to check.
      time - The time to check.
      Returns:
      True if the time slot is available, false otherwise.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public List<Appointment> rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentId, String newDate, String newTime)
      Reschedules an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newDate - The new date.
      newTime - The new time.
      Returns:
      The rescheduled appointment if successful, otherwise an empty list.

    • cancelAppointment

      public boolean cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Cancels an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to cancel.
      Returns:
      True if cancellation was successful, false otherwise.

    • getAvailableSlots

      public List<String> getAvailableSlots(String doctorId)
      Retrieves a list of available appointment slots for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      Returns:
      A list of available appointment slots as strings.

    • respondToAppointmentRequest

      public boolean respondToAppointmentRequest(String appointmentId, String action)
      Allows doctors to accept or decline appointment requests.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment.
      action - "accept" or "decline"
      Returns:
      True if the action was successful, false otherwise.

    • getAppointmentsForPatient

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentsForPatient(String patientId)
      Retrieves appointments for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The patient's ID.
      Returns:
      List of appointments.

    • getAppointmentsForDoctor

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentsForDoctor(String doctorId)
      Retrieves appointments for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      Returns:
      List of appointments.

    • getAllAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of all appointments.
      Returns:
      a list of Appointment objects containing all appointments.

    • getAppointmentById

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentById(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves a list of appointments based on the given appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of appointments that match the given appointment ID

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      public boolean updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentId, String status)
      Updates the status of an appointment identified by the given appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be updated.
      status - The new status to be set for the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment status was successfully updated, false if the appointment was not found.
